short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically organize, summarize, and report on customer feedback from any website or web app using the Caravel Clipper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Caravel is the fastest way to understand what matters most to your customers. A single system that unifies qualitative data from all of your apps, platforms, and messages that drive customer interactions and hands you prioritized insights.

We built Clipper to submit emails, tickets, reviews, notes, social comments, or transcripts from any cloud-based application to your Caravel workspace for automatic analysis.

SAVE AND ANALYZE VOICE OF THE CUSTOMER DATA WITH JUST ONE CLICK
Highlight the text you want to save for insight and let Caravel do the analysis work for you.

USE WITH YOUR CRM, HELPDESK, OR EMAIL CLIENT OF CHOICE
Clipper works seamlessly with Intercom, HelpScout, Front, Gmail, and more. On Zendesk, Salesforce, Slack, or Freshdesk? You can use it for those too, but we encourage you to connect the free real-time integrations instead. üòâ

ACCESS FEEDBACK FROM ANYWHERE IN CARAVEL, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT
Clipped feedback is always accessible from your Caravel account, even after it's removed from another website or app.

SHARE AND TAKE ACTION
Caravel makes it easy to share insights with your teammates, turn them into action items, link them to projects, generate reports, and more.

With the Caravel, your teams gain a direct line of sight to your customer feedback across the web. Happy clipping! ‚úÇÔ∏è

‚ú® Learn more and signup for free at http://www.caravelapp.com ‚ú®
